column1: #Text=Do n't you hate when you want to make a wish come true but do n't know how to ?
#Text=Here are some really easy steps to get your wish granted , or TRY too .
#Text=If you want that , then keep reading .
#Text=Your counting down to your birthday ! And your hoping the wish comes true .
#Text=Draw pictures , write down your wishes , do anything you want explaining your wishes .
#Text=Some people say to get a charm bracelet , choker , or anything you can wear .
#Text=Find a gold or silver chain and get a charm based on it .
#Text=If you want an animal , get the animal charm of it .
#Text=Any charm based on what you want will work .
#Text=Where it till your wish starts coming true
